overview: Christopher Keith, is the former Chief Technology Officer of the New York Stock Exchange. In 2007 Mr. Keith turned his attention to online advertising after observing many parallels between the fragmented and redundant online audience targeting space and the technology which powers market data and trading systems. In addition to Brilig, Mr. Keith is Chairman of PDQ enterprises, a next generation trading platform which shares many principles with Brilig. Some of his previous positions include: CTO of Wit Capital, DNS (financial communication arm of ADP) and Security Industry Automation Corporation (SIAC).
